text.tspan: Healthy life expectancy vs. health expenditure per capita, 2016
Healthy life expectancy, defined as the average number of years lived free from disability or disease burden, versus
average per capita health expenditure measured in current international-$.
Current health expenditure per capita, PPP (current international $)
Data source: Institute for Health Metrics and Evaluation, World Health Organization (via World Bank)
